We haven't forgotten about this skin OP (TheBravoRay, skins-team's Swain super-fan, talks about it weekly). Not sure when it'll finally happen, I hope we can do it in 2015 but I can't promise anything.

Swain needs a badass legendary skin and giving him some awesome Dragon transformation anims would be really fun. Hype hype hype. I wanna animate dragons.
Update? :)

Just so nobody has any new expectations that will get crushed: Dragon Master Swain is not slotted for production at any point in 2016 currently. There was a glimmer of hope for the skin in 2015 when I posted that, but it wasn't able to happen.


Sorry, I share your pain :\

Morbid curiosity here....

Why Tristana over Swain?

Tristana has more skins. She has a legendary skin already. And Swain's last skin came out roughly the same time as Tristana's, except Tristana's had a visual update since then.

So why wasn't Tristana's 'Dragon Trainer' skin creation slot given to Swain for a Dragon Master skin instead?

Probably because they have plans for a small scale rework for Swain, just like Tristana, so they don't want to make a skin for him that would have all sorts of effects and such since they'd have to redo it. Since Tristana got her visual update she was a perfect choice for a skin of this level.
it's simple, no one understands riot logic
